Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound #75 buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago, and 75th, due to an accident near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago, and 75th, due to an accident near 75th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
